parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('htmlHeader')}

Power Automate

Auto-Archive .

As a reminder, you approved removal of this app from the tenant on @{outputs('Date_Approved')}.
The app will therefore be removed from the tenant sometime after @{outputs('Date_to_Delete')},

App Environment: @{items('Create_Archival_Request_for_Each_')?['admin_appenvironmentdisplayname']}
App Display Name: @{body('See_if_app_still_exists')?['properties']?['displayName']}

If you want to retain a copy of this app for later restore in the event that you change your mind, please do so now.
If you would like to stop recieving these reminders ahead of deletion, please delete on your side, and you will not be prompted again.

Thank you for using the Power Platform!
